text: Swafford may refer to: * Howard G. Swafford (1919–2016), American politician * Hudson Swafford (born September 9, 1987), American professional golfer * Jan Swafford (born September 10, 1946), American composer and author * Martina Swafford (pen name, "Belle Bremer"; 1845-1913), American poet
title: Swafford
